data.title: Traffic Count Information Systems
data.text:
NCTCOG provides a listing of associated current and historic traffic counts and additional information shared with the Texas Department of Transportation (TXDOT).

Other sources for traffic counts not associated to NCTCOG

TxDOT web page of traffic counts

Map of traffic counts in other Texas locations

â€‹For further help or assistance please review our traffic count assistance page.

Prepared in cooperation with the Texas Department of Transportation and the U.S. Department of Transportation, Federal Highway Administration and Federal Transit Administration. The contents of this report reflect the views of the authors who are responsible for the opinions, findings, and conclusions presented herein. The contents do not necessarily reflect the views or policies of the Federal Transit Administration, the Federal Highway Administration, the U.S. Department of Transportation, or the Texas Department of Transportation.
